lines.text: Roy, you're dead. And long as you stay dead you ain't gonna get killed!
Don't tell me you want to be an actor.
No, ma'am, I promised my ma I'd lead an upright life.
We put the rodeo on ice as soon as we got Frog's message
You can reopen it when you get back
Whats the matter with you? You wanna' live forever?
lines.character: Pat - Member Sons of the Pioneers
